item.title: In July, Walton will be hosting a gaming session for Cashflow 101
item.description:
Source: Walton eDM. The Walton Group (Walton), a multinational real estate investment and development company specializing in pre-development land investments in North America, is hosting another session of the Cashflow 101 board game in Singapore. Cashflow 101, also known as the Cash Flow game, was created by Robert Kiyosaki, author of Rich Dad Poor Dad. The game aims to help players connect their life goals with their finances by shifting their perspective on cash flow and investment...

item.title: Walton encourages financial literacy through moderated Cashflow games
item.description:
Playing the Cashflow game was a thrilling experience. I managed to buy and sell a startup within an hour, earning a quick $100,000 profit. With my pilot’s salary, cash flow was excellent. However, other players faced financial struggles, barely making ends meet or lacking funds for investments. I focused on smaller investments initially, cleared some liabilities with guidance from the banker, and increased my spending and income. Although my passive income was slightly less than my expenses, someone else came closer to achieving financial freedom...
